name: Super Sticky Bros
description:
Super addictive gameplay. We spend so much time playing this game that we don't have time to work on other games.

* Climb, jump and reach for the top.
* Play with your friends. Up to 4-player multiplayer mode.
* Death is never the end, only makes you stronger!
* Control is so smooth that it feels like part of you.
* Tons of character and level skins.

Follow Us
